comments.author: romaxa@gmail.com
comments.text:
elfhack crashes on my android build
00:21 < romaxa> #0  0x0804def2 in ElfSection::getType() ()
00:21 < romaxa> #1  0x0805aa31 in int do_relocation_section<Elf_Rel>(Elf*, unsigned int, unsigned int) ()
00:21 < romaxa> #2  0x0805861b in do_file(char const*, bool) ()
00:21 < romaxa> #3  0x0805884f in main ()

moszonfig:

# Add the correct paths here:
ac_add_options --with-android-ndk="$HOME/androidDownloads/android-ndk-r7"
ac_add_options --with-android-sdk="$HOME/androidDownloads/android-sdk-linux/platforms/android-13"
ac_add_options --with-android-version=8
# Global options
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=-j4
# Nightlies only since this has a cost in performance
ac_add_options --enable-js-diagnostics
# Build Fennec
ac_add_options --enable-application=mobile/android
# Android
ac_add_options --target=arm-linux-androideabi
ac_add_options --with-endian=little
ac_add_options --with-system-zlib
ac_add_options --enable-update-channel=${MOZ_UPDATE_CHANNEL}
export MOZILLA_OFFICIAL=1
ac_add_options --with-branding=mobile/xul/branding/nightly
mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR=./objdir-droid-dbg

android-ndk-r7
android-sdk_r15
